title: Cannot update to new client
body: OK so, quick rundown of what happened. I kept getting the Error 003 message. Following the assorted steps recomended, I ended up full uninstalling League. Now when I reinstall, it is using the old client. When I click launch, it closes and nothing happens.

replies.body: JJI744 did it worked to you ?

Eventually yes. Im not sure what happened, but it did update to the new client and after reinstalling League it worked.

Had a weird thing where I played a game of Hearthstone while I was waiting and it went from 78% complete down to 72%.

Hey there, while investigating this issue we've found that using the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to reinstall might resolve the 003 for some players.  Give it a go and let me know if it helps!

You'll want to get the legacy client updated to the current version, but you might have some settings blocking it from launching.  Restart your PC, then run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is added as an exception.  Once you're up to date everything should be good to go!
